impact-statement: The microRNA, miR-146a, is regulated by mutant BRAF/NRAS proteins, and promotes the development of melanoma via increasing Notch signaling pathway, suggesting that combining drugs targeting BRAF/NRAS and Notch may provide an effective melanoma treatment.
